articles.title: Fencing: Catantan bows out in semis, fails to clinch Tokyo berth - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Filipina fencer Samantha Catantan fell short of securing a spot in the Tokyo Olympics at the Asia-Oceania qualifiers held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
articles.content:

articles.title: Winning director Zhao makes Oscars history, but honour censored in China - Malaysiakini
articles.description: She's the first Asian woman to win the coveted prize at the Academy Award.
articles.content:
Chloe Zhao made history as the first Asian woman and second woman ever to win best director at the Academy Awards, but her big moment was blacked out from live television in her native China.

articles.title: Singaporean fencer Amita Berthier earns Olympic spot after winning qualification tournament - CNA
